appendix.title: Example of Setting Up a Simple Testing Resource
appendix.para: This chapter provides a basic example for the configuration of a simple resource: an IP address. It demonstrates both approaches to do so, using either &hawk; or the &crmshell; command line tool.

For the following example, we assume that you have set up your cluster as described in and that your cluster consists of at least two nodes, alice and bob. For an introduction and more details of how to use &hawk; and &crmsh; , refer to the following chapters:
